## sdfCylinder variable

Returns signed distance from `p` to cylinder centered around Y-axis with height `h` and radius `r`<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sdfCylinder: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").TaggedFn3<"vec3", "float", "float", "float">
```
